sentences.sContent: That chair doesn’t look very sturdy.
sentences.sCn: 那把椅子看上去不太结实。

sentences.sContent: They kept up a sturdy opposition to the plan.
sentences.sCn: 他们一直坚决反对那项计划。

sentences.sContent: ...when manufacturing generated a sturdy 28% of the national income...

trans.tranOther: (of an object) strong and not easily damaged
